item.title: Internet Archive expands Flash support
item.description: - The Internet Archive has made significant advancements in its flash emulation, thanks to the efforts of volunteers Nosamu and bai0.

item.title: WordPress Playground: A WordPress that runs entirely in the browser
item.description: - WordPress Playground is a platform that allows users to run and experiment with WordPress entirely in their web browser.

item.title: S.F. says incidents by Cruise, Waymo driverless taxis are 'skyrocketing.'
item.description: - The text provided does not contain any meaningful content, as it appears to be an error message or captcha verification.

item.title: Dropped iPad implicated in fatal Rotak Chinook helicopter crash
item.description: - An Apple iPad likely caused a fatal helicopter crash when it jammed against the co-pilot's left pedal, according to investigators from the National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB).

item.title: On Becoming a VP of Engineering
item.description: - The author shares their experience transitioning from a Director of Engineering to a VP of Engineering at Honeycomb.

item.title: India's Chandrayaan-3 launches to explore moons water rich South Pole
item.description: - India's Chandrayaan-3 mission has been successfully launched to explore the water-rich south pole of the moon.

item.title: Super Mario 64 – Watch for Rolling Rocks – 0.5x a Presses [video]
item.description: - The post is about a video demonstrating a speedrunning technique in the game Super Mario 64.

item.title: Mandatory enforcement of indirect branch targets
item.description: - OpenBSD has implemented mandatory enforcement of indirect branch targets on the AMD64 (Intel) and ARM64 platforms.

item.title: The Problem with LangChain
item.description: - LangChain is a Python and JavaScript library for interfacing with OpenAI's GPT APIs.

item.title: Food companies 'sweetened the world' & increased the risk of disease
item.description: - Food companies in developing countries are marketing ultra-processed foods as being healthy and beneficial, which is increasing the risk of non-communicable diseases (NCDs) such as diabetes and hypertension.
